title: Speech 1.9.3 – Intuitive text-to-speech app
content: Speech combines all the features of the speech synthesizer of Mac OS X into a single, easy-to-use interface. title: MarkMyWords 2.4.0 – Provides format and structuring functions for online publishing
content: MarkMyWords offers easy formatting and structuring functions for articles which will be published on the Web and remains platform-independent by using plain text documents.   Features Support of a variety of markup-languages Live-preview of the content and possibility to add own CSS-stylesheets Use of text-templates and markers for quick text navigation Easy import of text-data […]

title: Express Invoice 9.38 – Manage client accounts, create invoices and apply payments
content: Express Invoice allows you to manage client accounts, create invoices and apply payments. You can then print, email or fax your invoices to your clients directly from the application.   This invoice software allows you to create re-occurring invoices for ongoing services and link to credit card gateways to easily process payments for goods and […]

title: Text Workflow 1.0.7 – Transform text with workflows
content: A powerful and easy to use tool that will help you transform your text. Text Workflow removes the need to perform repetitive tasks manually on your text. Combine transformation actions to create powerful automations for your text. Save your transformation workflows to use them any time want.   Available text transformation actions: Add suffix Replace […]

title: Ghost Buster Pro 1.2.0 – Delete Junk Files of Old Apps
content: Ghost Buster Pro finds and deletes files from apps you’ve already uninstalled. The app is lightning fast and frees memory in no time.   Many apps are installed on a computer, but they usually only stay on your computer for a short time. Each app creates files, but deleting the app does not remove them. […]

title: Adobe Dreamweaver 2021 21.2 – Build world-class websites and applications
